link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xlink-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/instance http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-instance-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/custom-function http://www.xbrl.org/2010/custom-function-implementation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2010/validation-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd

gen:link.msg:message:
"Reporting of ""If Yes, Please furnish the details of such change (Including Dates of change)"" is mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" in ""Postal address, telephone number/s and fax number/s of the registered/corporate office"".
Reporting of ""If Yes, Please furnish the details of such change (Including Dates of change)"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""No"" in ""Postal address, telephone number/s and fax number/s of the registered/corporate office""."

"Reporting of ""If Yes, Please furnish the details of such change (Including Dates of change)"" is mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" in ""Names and residential addresses of the directors of the company"".
Reporting of ""If Yes, Please furnish the details of such change (Including Dates of change)"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""No"" in ""Names and residential addresses of the directors of the company""."

"Reporting of ""If Yes, Please furnish the details of such change (Including Dates of change)"" is mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" in ""Names and the official designations of its principal officers"".
Reporting of ""If Yes, Please furnish the details of such change (Including Dates of change)"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""No"" in ""Names and the official designations of its principal officers""."

"Reporting of ""If Yes, Please furnish the details of such change (Including Dates of change)"" is mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" in ""Names and office address of the auditors of the company"".
Reporting of ""If Yes, Please furnish the details of such change (Including Dates of change)"" is not mandatory, If user select ""No"" in ""Names and office address of the auditors of the company""."

"Reporting of ""If Yes, Please furnish the details of such change (Including Dates of change)"" is mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" in ""Specimen signatures of the officers authorised to sign on behalf of the company"".
Reporting of ""If Yes, Please furnish the details of such change (Including Dates of change)"" is not mandatory,If user select ""No"" in ""Specimen signatures of the officers authorised to sign on behalf of the company""."

"Reporting of ""If NO, provide detail of non- compliance"" is mandatory, If user selects ""No"" in ""Whether company complied with provisions of paragraph 6(1) of Master Direction DNBR (PD) 090/ 03.10.124/2017-18 dated October 04, 2017 as updated from time to time"".
Reporting of ""If NO, provide detail of non- compliance"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" in ""Whether company complied with provisions of paragraph 6(1) of Master Direction DNBR (PD) 090/ 03.10.124/2017-18 dated October 04, 2017 as updated from time to time""."

"Reporting of ""If Yes, provide detail of such loans"" is mandatory, f user selects ""Yes"" in ""Does maturity of any of the loans facilitated by the NBFC-P2P on its lending platform exceeds 36 months?"".
Reporting of ""If Yes, provide detail of such loans"" is not mandatory, f user selects ""No"" in ""Does maturity of any of the loans facilitated by the NBFC-P2P on its lending platform exceeds 36 months?""."

"Reporting of ""If NO, Please furnish the relevant details"" is mandatory, If user selects ""No"" in ""Has company obtained a certificate from the borrowers or lenders, as prescribed in paragraph of 7 (2), 7(3) & 7(4) of Master Direction DNBR (PD) 090/ 03.10.124/2017-18 dated October 04, 2017 as updated from time to time above are being adhered to"".
Reporting of ""If NO, Please furnish the relevant details"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" in ""Has company obtained a certificate from the borrowers or lenders, as prescribed in paragraph of 7 (2), 7(3) & 7(4) of Master Direction DNBR (PD) 090/ 03.10.124/2017-18 dated October 04, 2017 as updated from time to time above are being adhered to""."

"Reporting of ""If NO, Please furnish the relevant details"" is mandatory, If user selects ""No"" in ""Has company maintained at least two escrow accounts, one for funds received from lenders and pending disbursal, and the other for collections from borrowers"".
Reporting of ""If NO, Please furnish the relevant details"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" in ""Has company maintained at least two escrow accounts, one for funds received from lenders and pending disbursal, and the other for collections from borrowers""."

"Reporting of ""If NO, provide information which is not disclosed"" is mandatory, If user selects ""No"" in ""Does company publicly discloses information mentioned in paragraph 11(1)(iii) of Master Direction DNBR (PD) 090/ 03.10.124/2017-18 as updated from time to time on its website"".
Reporting of ""If NO, provide information which is not disclosed"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" in ""Does company publicly discloses information mentioned in paragraph 11(1)(iii) of Master Direction DNBR (PD) 090/ 03.10.124/2017-18 as updated from time to time on its website""."

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'Yes') then (not(empty($V2))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'No') then (empty($V2)) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'Not Applicable') then (empty($V2)) else 'false')

gen:link.msg:message:
"Reporting of ""If YES, please furnish details of such non-compliance and/or unfavourable or qualified statements (As required under extant Master Direction on Auditor's Report)"" is mandatory, if user selects ""Yes"" in ""Is there any exception report with respect to non-compliance with the provisions of Chapter III B of RBI Act"".
Reporting of ""If YES, please furnish details of such non-compliance and/or unfavourable or qualified statements (As required under extant Master Direction on Auditor's Report)"" is not mandatory, if user selects ""No"" in ""Is there any exception report with respect to non-compliance with the provisions of Chapter III B of RBI Act""."

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'Yes') then (not(empty($V2))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'No') then (empty($V2)) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'Not Applicable') then (empty($V2)) else 'false')

gen:link.msg:message:
"Reporting of ""If YES, please furnish details of such non-compliance and/or unfavourable or qualified statements (As required under extant Master Direction on Auditor's Report)"" is mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" in ""Is there any exception report with respect to non-compliance with the provisions of Non-Banking Financial Companies Acceptance of Public Deposits (Reserve Bank) Directions, 2016, as updated from time to time"".
Reporting of ""If YES, please furnish details of such non-compliance and/or unfavourable or qualified statements (As required under extant Master Direction on Auditor's Report)"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""No"" in ""Is there any exception report with respect to non-compliance with the provisions of Non-Banking Financial Companies Acceptance of Public Deposits (Reserve Bank) Directions, 2016, as updated from time to time""."

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'Yes') then (not(empty($V2))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'No') then (empty($V2)) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'Not Applicable') then (empty($V2)) else 'false')

gen:link.msg:message:
"Reporting of ""If YES, please furnish details of such non-compliance and/or unfavourable or qualified statements (As required under extant Master Direction on Auditor's Report)"" is mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" in ""Is there any exception report with respect to non-compliance with the provisions of Non-Banking Financial Company"" Non-Systemically Important Non-Deposit taking Company (Reserve Bank) Directions, 2016 and Non-Banking Financial Company - Systemically Important Non-Deposit taking Company and Deposit taking Company (Reserve Bank) Directions, 2016, as updated from time to time"".
Reporting of ""If YES, please furnish details of such non-compliance and/or unfavourable or qualified statements (As required under extant Master Direction on Auditor's Report)"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""No"" in ""Is there any exception report with respect to non-compliance with the provisions of Non-Banking Financial Company"" Non-Systemically Important Non-Deposit taking Company (Reserve Bank) Directions, 2016 and Non-Banking Financial Company - Systemically Important Non-Deposit taking Company and Deposit taking Company (Reserve Bank) Directions, 2016, as updated from time to time""."
